data.text: Nomuli, gei di Hagataalunga gaa lahi a Jesus gi di anggowaa belee hagamada go Setan.4.1 Hebrews 2.18; 4.15
I muli nia laangi madahaa ge madahaa boo, gei Mee digi miami, gu hiigai.
Gei Setan ga hanimoi gi Mee, ga helekai, “Maa goe di Tama a God, helekai gi nia hadu aanei gii hai nia palaawaa.”
Jesus ga helekai, “Ma guu lawa di hihi i lodo di Beebaa Dabu boloo:
Setan gaa lahi Jesus gi Jerusalem, go di Waahale Hagamadagu, gaa dugu a Mee gi di ulu di Hale Daumaha,
ga helekai gi Mee, “Maa goe di Tama a God, hobo ia gi daha, gii hai be nnelekai di Beebaa Dabu boloo:
Jesus ga helekai, “Ma guu lawa di hihi labelaa i lodo di Beebaa Dabu boloo:
Setan gaa lahi labelaa a Mee gi tomo di gonduu duuduu i nua ga hagi anga gi Mee nia henua huogodoo o henuailala mo nadau madamada,
ga helekai, “Au ga gowadu gi di Goe nia mee huogodoo aanei, maa Goe ga dogoduli, ga daumaha mai gi di au.”
Jesus ga helekai, “Tuu i daha mo Au, Setan! Di Beebaa Dabu e helekai boloo:
Setan guu hana gi daha mo Jesus. Gei digau di langi ga lloomoi, ga hagamaamaa a Mee.
Di madagoaa Jesus ne longono bolo John la guu lahi gi lodo di hale galabudi, ge Ia gaa hana gi Galilee.4.12 Matthew 14.3; Mark 6.17; Luke 3.19-20
Gei Mee digi noho i Nazareth, gaa hana, gaa noho i Capernaum, tama waahale i tongotai di Tai o Galilee, i lodo nnenua Zebulun mo Naphtali.4.13 John 2.12
Di mee deenei ne hai bolo gi kila ai nia helekai ala ne hai go soukohp Isaiah:
“Tenua go Zebulun mo Naphtali,
Nia daangada ala nogo noho i lodo di bouli,
Daamada i di madagoaa deelaa, gei Jesus ga agoago, “Huli gi daha mo godou huaidu, idimaa, Teenua King o God di Langi la gu hoohoo mai!”4.17 Matthew 3.2
Jesus nogo haele i tongotai di Tai o Galilee, ga gidee tagahaanau daane hai waga daha dogolua, go Simon e haga ingoo bolo Peter, mo Andrew, e wagadaha i di gubenge i lodo di monowai.
Jesus ga helekai gi meemaa, “Lloomoi i ogu muli, gei Au ga aago goolua di haangodo gi nia daangada.”
Di madagoaa hua deelaa, meemaa ga diiagi nau gubenge, gaa hula i muli o Jesus.

Mee ga hanadu, ga gidee labelaa tagahaanau dogolua go James mo John, nia dama daane ni Zebedee. Meemaa i hongo di boodi i baahi di nau damana Zebedee, e hagatogomaalia nadau gubenge. Jesus gaa gahi meemaa.
Di madagoaa hua deelaa, meemaa ga diiagi di nau boodi mo tamana, gaa hula i muli o Jesus.
Jesus gaa hana gi lodo Galilee hagatau, ga agoago i lodo nia synagogee digaula, e agoago di Longo Humalia Teenua King o God, gei e hagahili ana hagadilinga magi e logo.4.23 Matthew 9.35; Mark 1.39

Di longo o Maa guu dele gi nia gowaa huogodoo i Syria, gei nia daangada ga laha mai gi Jesus nadau gau magi huogodoo i nia hagadilinga magi e logo: digau gu iai di hagataalunga huaidu, hai hoodube, mo digau mmade nadau huaidina, gei Jesus gu haga hili nia magi digaula huogodoo.

Nia daangada dogologowaahee nogo daudali a Mee mai i Galilee, Decapolis4.25 Decapolis: Di ingoo deenei dono hadinga i nnelekai Greek boloo, “nia waahale e madangaholu”, Jerusalem, Judea, mo tenua i bahi i dua di monowai Jordan.
